edu.cmu.tartan

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.tartan.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class for game logic. Many if not all decisions about game play are made from this class.

    Project: LG Exec Ed SDET Program 2018 Jeffrey S. Gennari Versions: 1.0 March 2018 - initial version

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game()
      Create and configure a new game.
